remarks: Univariate polynomial evaluation for subrings maps the variable to the identity function.  (Contributed by AV, 13-Sep-2019.)
statement:
evls1var.q $e |- Q = ( S evalSub1 R ) $.
evls1var.x $e |- X = ( var1 ` U ) $.
evls1var.u $e |- U = ( S |`s R ) $.
evls1var.b $e |- B = ( Base ` S ) $.
evls1var.s $e |- ( ph -> S e. CRing ) $.
evls1var.r $e |- ( ph -> R e. ( SubRing ` S ) ) $.
evls1var $p |- ( ph -> ( Q ` X ) = ( _I |` B ) ) $.
